cards.name: Capital One VentureOne Rewards Credit Card - Miles Boost
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn unlimited 1.25X miles on every purchase, every day. Earn 5X miles on hotels and rental cars booked through Capital One Travel, where you'll get Capital One's best prices on thousands of trip options.
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn a bonus of 40,000 miles once you spend $1,000 on purchases within 3 months from account opening, equal to $400 in travel.

cards.name: Wells Fargo Active Cash® Card
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn unlimited 2% cash rewards on purchases
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn a $200 cash rewards bonus after spending $500 in purchases in the first 3 months.

cards.name: Chase Freedom Unlimited®
cards.rewards_tooltip: Enjoy 5% cash back on travel purchased through Chase Travel℠, 3% cash back on drugstore purchases and dining at restaurants, including takeout and eligible delivery service, and unlimited 1.5% cash back on all other purchases.
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Intro Offer: Earn a $200 Bonus after you spend $500 on purchases in your first 3 months from account opening.

cards.name: Capital One Savor Cash Rewards Credit Card
cards.best_for: Best for Going out & staying in
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn unlimited 3% cash back at grocery stores (excluding superstores like Walmart® and Target®), on dining, entertainment and popular streaming services, plus 1% on all other purchases. Earn 8% cash back on Capital One Entertainment purchases. Earn unlimited 5% cash back on hotels and rental cars booked through Capital One Travel. Terms apply.
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn a one-time $200 cash bonus once you spend $500 on purchases within the first 3 months from account opening.

cards.name: Wells Fargo Autograph® Card
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn unlimited 3X points on restaurants, travel, gas stations, transit, popular streaming services and phone plans. Plus earn 1X points on other purchases.
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn 20,000 bonus points when you spend $1,000 in purchases in the first 3 months - that's a $200 cash redemption value.

cards.name: Wells Fargo Reflect® Card
cards.best_for: Best for Longest 0% intro APR period

cards.name: Discover it® Cash Back
cards.best_for: Best for Quarterly categories + matching bonus
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn 5% cash back on everyday purchases at different places you shop each quarter like grocery stores, restaurants, gas stations, and more, up to the quarterly maximum when you activate. Plus, earn unlimited 1% cash back on all other purchases.
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: INTRO OFFER: Unlimited Cashback Match for all new cardmembers – only from Discover. Discover will automatically match all the cash back you’ve earned at the end of your first year! There’s no minimum spending or maximum rewards. You could turn $150 cash back into $300.

cards.name: Citi Double Cash® Card
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn 2% on every purchase with unlimited 1% cash back when you buy, plus an additional 1% as you pay for those purchases. To earn cash back, pay at least the minimum due on time. Plus, earn 5% total cash back on hotel, car rentals and attractions booked with Citi Travel.
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn $200 cash back after you spend $1,500 on purchases in the first 6 months of account opening. This bonus offer will be fulfilled as 20,000 ThankYou® Points, which can be redeemed for $200 cash back.

cards.name: Hilton Honors American Express Card
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn 7X Hilton Honors Bonus Points for each dollar of eligible purchases charged directly with hotels and resorts within the Hilton portfolio. Earn 5X Points per dollar on purchases at U.S. restaurants, at U.S. supermarkets, and at U.S. gas stations. Earn 3X Points for all other eligible purchases on your Card. Terms Apply.
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn 100,000 Hilton Honors Bonus Points and a $100 Statement Credit after you spend $2,000 on eligible purchases on the Hilton Honors American Express® Card within your first 6 months of Card Membership. Offer Ends 8/13/2025. Terms Apply.

cards.name: Ink Business Cash® Credit Card
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn 5% cash back on the first $25,000 spent in combined purchases at office supply stores and on internet, cable and phone services each account anniversary year, Earn 2% cash back on the first $25,000 spent in combined purchases at gas stations and restaurants each account anniversary year, Earn 1% cash back on all other card purchases with no limit to the amount you can earn
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn $350 when you spend $3,000 on purchases in the first three months and an additional $400 when you spend $6,000 on purchases in the first six months after account opening.

cards.name: American Airlines AAdvantage® MileUp®
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn 2 AAdvantage® miles for each $1 spent at grocery stores, including grocery delivery services; Earn 2 AAdvantage® miles for every $1 spent on eligible American Airlines purchases; Earn 1 AAdvantage® mile for every $1 spent on other purchases
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn 15,000 American Airlines AAdvantage® bonus miles after making $1,000 in purchases within the first 3 months of account opening.

cards.name: Chase Freedom Flex®
cards.best_for: Best for Quarterly categories + cash bonus
cards.rewards_tooltip: Earn 5% cash back on up to $1,500 in combined purchases in bonus categories each quarter you activate. Earn 5% on Chase travel purchased through Chase Travel®, 3% on dining and drugstores, and 1% on all other purchases.
cards.intro_offer_tooltip: Earn a $200 Bonus after you spend $500 on purchases in your first 3 months from account opening.
